row.entry: Spigot wrench for Alpine A110 R/FA
Side opening element exterior control module handle centring device for flush fitting trim.
The jig enables the centring and compliance of the clearances and flush fitting of the side opening element exterior control module. RDE-001867662-07-000355441

Product base: single component acetic silicone
Sealing resin for engine and gearbox covers.
Joint face seal, side seal for crankshaft bearing cap.

para.b: Super cleaning agent for seal faces

entry.para: Clean the polymerised and traditional joints in 10 to 15 minutes.
Prevents poor contacts in electrical circuits
Base oil and additive: silicone oil
Working temperature range: - 30°C to + 150°C, hot working up to + 250°C

para.b: Cleaner for the heating and air conditioning system

entry.para: Solid lubricant: aluminium, graphite, extreme pressure additives
Product base: lithium E.P. mineral oil
Silicone grease containing specially formulated oil and solid lubricants. Has excellent dielectric properties that are maintained when the material is subject to temperatures over 200°C

row.entry: Plastic tub with wet cleaning wipes

para.b: Special adhesive for interior rear-view mirror

entry.para: The sealant features good adhesion and excellent resistance to humidity and climatic variations. It remains flexible, has good thermal resistance and is durable.

para.b: Sealing mastic as preformed bead, type "MEG"

entry.para: Ready-to-use, this mastic is quick and easy to apply. It does not require any application material and provides sealing and bonding.

para.b: Pre-formed seal primer for commercial vehicle

entry.para: Applied as extruded net or spray

row.entry: Black double-sided adhesive tape, designed for bonding interior or exterior automobile accessories. RDE-001867662-08-000447987

entry.para: MJ Pro paint sealing mastic is available in white, grey or black to best match the seal to the colour of the vehicle. It can be applied over a 1K or 2K primer and can be recoated after 20 minutes. As a one-component product, it is characterized by rapid curing and offers excellent adhesion. Electro-spot weldable, it can be smoothed or brushed after application.

para.b: Anti-gravel mastic type "SPR GRIS EVOLUTION II"

entry.para: Single-component soundproofing product for appearance and protection of the substructure (bodywork and mechanical parts).
Is applied as a supplement to the bodywork anti-gravel mastic.
The self-adhesive bitumen soundproofing pads ensure sound isolation and absorb vibrations. Available in two thickness diameters.
This product can be used to remove adhesive and tree resin residues
Surface preparation, degreasing agent, for use before priming
Apply in a very thin coat

Is it essential to apply a layer of pre-treatment primer on a bare panel (stripping, straightening, sanding, drilling, etc.) to ensure the (chemical) adhesion of the paint undercoats and guarantee protection against corrosion.
